name: @opuscapita/event-client
description: An event client to handle the event system in microservices architecture.

scripts.debug: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nodemon --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9228 --watch src/**/*.js --watch kafka/**/*.js  --watch kafka/local/ local/debug.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc mocha --timeout 120000 --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-raw: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx mocha --timeout 120000 --recursive
scripts.test:watch: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:9228 --timeout 120000 --recursive --watch ./kafka/**/*.js --watch test/
scripts.test-coverage: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --timeout 120000 && sed -i 's/\/home\/node\/event-client\//\.\//g' coverage/lcov.info
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch -m 'Version set to %s. [skip ci]'

author: Dennis Buecker <dennis.buecker@opuscapita.com>
